attributes.review: I can’t believe this app even exists. I was so excited to rave about my favorite president but when I opened the app my phone shut down. Turns out, if you’re not 100% white the app will give your phone a virus. I’m so disappointed. My phone will barley function and I just think it’s unfair since I’m only 50% Mexican. I want to embrace the white in me, BUT NO this app is totally racist, unlike the president. I’m afraid ICE is going to show up to my house because I got a warning saying they know about my family. Please DONT GET THIS APP ITS HORRIBLE.
attributes.title: Don’t bother

attributes.title: A waste

attributes.review: You won’t believe it... so i was using the app, and all of a sudden i get a notification that said and i quote, “If you don’t leave us a five star review within the next twenty four hours, you will regret it” naturally i ignored it because well, yk. But then.... my 24 hours ended, another notification popped up and said, “You didn’t obey the orders, prepare for your mother to pay”, i laughed a little bit, until my mom texted me saying she was in the hospital after receiving a text that said, “we stepped on the crack”.
attributes.title: LITERALLY STEPPED ON A CRACK TO BREAK MY MOMS BACK

attributes.review: This app is really bad!! I barely got it and my whole phone started flit I Ching and turned off, when I barely put my information it kicked me off the app, it’s so laggy also making my phone laggy! I hate this app it’s so horrible I would not recommend getting it! It runs really slow like really slow! Worst app on App Store! I would recommend taking it off! Really bad app, this has never happened to me before, this app is so glitchy and laggy! Don’t download it! HORRIBLE AND BAD APP! Like how is this still on the App Store🤢
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review:
Dear Mr. Trump,

    I decided to take a minute out of my exhausting day to write you, which was filled with eating American flags and wiping my period blood on the faces of innocent white Christian men (wouldn’t want to skimp on the details because I’m sure you wanted to feel right about the campfire stories you & your team cooks up about us). 

   Anyway, I just needed you to know that 2020 is your downfall. Our generation will not be strung along by the same old tricks as past generations have. There is no silence anymore. 

   The dumb people who cling to your “logic” will not rise above us. We are more present than ever. No amount of pandering will save you now. 

                                    Sincerely, 

                          your favorite liberal, or as you 
                          might ironically call us —      
                          The Antichrist
attributes.title: Fascism is Not in Fashion Egghead

attributes.review: I don't know what I was expecting but I downloaded the app and it automatically told me to delete it or they would steal my elephants. Being that I am half indian I felt it was a little racist, but I trekked forward nonetheless. Then I starting seeing threats everywhere. In ads, on the side of my screen, etc. I had no choice but to google it but nothing came up. I am worried. I don't have any elephants but frankly I still wouldn't like them to be stolen from me. Had to delete, it threatened me with things that don't exist :c
attributes.title: I dunno about this app man..

attributes.review: First, the problems started with the app sending a message saying that tea was just hot leaf juice. Then, it had the audacity to start endorsing a guy from the desert who stole a flying buffalo and muzzled him. Next, it started sending spam text messages to my girlfriend and she decided to take a trip on Space X to the moon to never come back. Meanwhile, it doesn’t even have the courtesy to say that my life has been rough, buddy. Only the Apple algorithm, master of all App Store elements, can bring peace and balance to the store.
attributes.title: This app was absolutely buggy beyond belief

attributes.review: This app stole my house I downloaded the app for some random reason and I was at my cousins house at the time then I rode my pet dragon to my house and my house wasn’t there so I went to my other cousins house on my pet unicorn then I went to go look for a new house but couldn’t find any so I slept at my cousins house then I saw I downloaded the app and uninstalled it I got back on my pet and went to see my other pets where my house was but then I saw my house and then I flew my pet fly to my cousins house to tell her that I found my house
attributes.title: HORRIBLE I CANT EVEN

attributes.review: This app is god awful, many people told me this app made their phone great again, however they were WRONG. After I got this it, it randomly started deleting my other apps based off their content and would make my phone start overheating every time I opened it. It definitely needs to be replaced with a better app. Something that’s completely different from the current one, this app is damaging my phone and I’m afraid it will make it irreparable if it isn’t fixed in the next few months.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: Ive been a MAGA supporter since before 9/11. I’m all for building the wall but this app is a disgrace to our beautiful land of the free. Logistics, the app design was awful and I couldn’t submit my vote through it. Not only that, but wait for this, it has black people on it supporting trump. Who thinks of this? MAGA is only, and I mean only, supposed to be for our beautiful pale complexion like us caucasians. We can’t have those uglies on our side. This app was a real atrocity and my vote for November will have to go to Nicki Minaj herself.
attributes.title: Trump App: worst thing that’s happened since 9/11
